title: Step Description
content: As the dust settles,Asdanaand the entire universe have escaped the fate of becoming puppets to theOrder. It seems some time has passed since theHarmonious Choirwere defeated... What has happened during this time?You hear a familiar voice approach from behind you. An irresistible force turns you on your heel as you (willingly) walk towards its source... After all, who can resist such a languid, elegant, and powerful Memokeeper?

speaker: March 7th
line: Wake up... Wake up...

speaker: March 7th
line: ▶ ...Hey, (Trailblazer)! Wake up! The sun's frying your butt!

speaker: March 7th
line: Are you all right? Can you hear me? Do you remember your name?

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: Not good. Try to remember. Your name is...

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: Alright, alright, stop joking around. The Lightning-Lord may be all-powerful, but they're not going to cause sudden memory loss. I'm just glad you're okay.

children.text: What happened while I was out?
Are we in the dream or reality?

text: Why does that line sound so familiar...

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: Hmm? It does? Well, doesn't ring any bells to me.

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: Looks like your mind's still in one piece, if you're able to remember such details... Well that's reassuring.

children.text: What happened while I was out?
Are we in the dream or reality?

text: Didn't I shoot the sun out of the sky...

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: Uh... kind of, it was General Jing Yuan who helped us shoot it down.

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: In any case, since you remember what happened just now... Well, that's put my mind at ease.

children.text: What happened while I was out?
Are we in the dream or reality?

speaker: March 7th
line: Mm... It's a long story. Simply put, Dan Heng used the jade abacus of allying oath when we were in the middle of a fierce battle, and summoned the general to help us just in time.

speaker: March 7th
line: And then, we returned to reality. Look, this is your room.

speaker: March 7th
line: Everyone else has also returned from the Dreamscape . Himeko and the rest are at the lobby discussing matters with the general. Now that you're awake, we should tell the Crew that you're all right. Come with me!

speaker: Black Swan
line: ▶ Not going to come chat with me... (Trailblazer)?

speaker: (Trailblazer)
line: ▶ (That voice... Is that Black Swan?)

speaker: March 7th
line: Hey, where are you going?

speaker: Black Swan
line: Hey, we meet again, sleepy head.

speaker: March 7th
line: Wh—What's Miss Black Swan doing here?

speaker: Black Swan
line: ▶ Nothing, Miss March. I noticed (Trailblazer) was awake and wanted to check to see how ( he / she ) was doing.

speaker: Black Swan
line: Though the strike from the General was timely, its destruction was also immense. When " Emanators " collide, ordinary people inevitably suffer.

speaker: Black Swan
line: But luckily for them, the Dreamscape is my home turf. Thankfully, I managed to get everyone out before the Harmonious Choir collapsed.

speaker: March 7th
line: Oh, so that's what happened! Thank you, Miss Black Swan.

speaker: Black Swan
line: Don't mention it, after all, I wouldn't want to see such precious memories vanish. You're heading to see your friends, aren't you? Would it bother you if I walked with you for a short while?

speaker: March 7th
line: Of course not... But you're not planning on doing something like last time, are you?

speaker: Black Swan
line: Why would you think that? I've never harbored any ill intentions... well, not when you were around, anyway.

text: Head to the VIP Lounge Rest Area and find Dan Heng

title: Mission Description
content: As the dust settles, Asdana and the entire universe have escaped the fate of becoming puppets to the Order. It seems some time has passed since the Harmonious Choir were defeated... What has happened during this time?Take a look aroundThe Reverie, regroup with your companions, and find out what's been going on.

speaker: March 7th
line: Himeko and Mr. Yang are probably still busy... Let's go look for Dan Heng first.

speaker: March 7th
line: Look, he's still talking to that cowboy!

speaker: Dan Heng
line: ▶ You're awake, (Trailblazer). How do you feel?

speaker: Boothill
line: Well fork me! You must be that Stellaron they were talkin' about.

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: ▶ Don't worry, (Trailblazer)'s been up and about for a while now. But hey, Dan Heng, why don't you introduce this cowboy to ( him / her ) first?

text: Dan Heng, why do you have to blab about everything...?

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: I... didn't mention anything to him.

children.speaker: Boothill
children.line: ▶ Partner, you got it all wrong. I heard it straight from the Memokeeper.

text: Fork, huh? I myself prefer spooning.

speaker: Black Swan
line: Allow me to introduce him to you: This is Boothill, a Galaxy Ranger .

speaker: Black Swan
line: During our pursuit of a certain person , we crossed paths and just so happened to uncover a shocking plot being concocted by Mr. Sunday ...

speaker: Black Swan
line: Which is why we sought you out, to help the Astral Express save the world together.

speaker: Boothill
line: No need for thanks! The Galaxy Rangers' principle is "Correct every injustice one sees". That's how you lot on the Xianzhou put it, right, Dan Heng?

speaker: Dan Heng
line: More or less.

speaker: March 7th
line: Wait. Hold on a sec. This is the first time I'm hearing about this "certain person"... Who are you chasing, and why would that lead you to the Express?

speaker: Boothill
line: Haha, good question! It's...

speaker: Boothill
line: Who was it again? Uh, Dan Heng, do you remember?

text: Come on, don't keep me in suspense.
IDK man you're looking kinda sus...

speaker: Boothill
line: Nah, that ain't it. I just can't seem to recall. Weird, my neuro chip hasn't registered any malfunctions...

speaker: Dan Heng
line: ...I can't seem to remember either.

speaker: March 7th
line: Uh... What's going on?

speaker: Boothill
line: Uh... heck, forget about it! If it's slipped all our minds, reckon that person was just a minor scoundrel, unimportant. Ain't gonna stop us from piecin' together the story anyhow.

speaker: Black Swan
line: ...Yes, when the dust settles, I'll just think of a way to recall it in the Memory Zone.

speaker: Black Swan
line: ▶ Everyone, let's hurry up and look for Miss Himeko, shall we? (Trailblazer)'s now a minor star on Penacony, and the entire hotel's concerned about ( his / her ) well-being.

speaker: March 7th
line: You're right. Let's head to the lobby then.

speaker: Boothill
line: You guys go. I'm an outsider after all — I'd rather not disrupt a long-awaited reunion.

title: Step Description
content: As the dust settles, Asdana and the entire universe have escaped the fate of becoming puppets to the Order. It seems some time has passed since the Harmonious Choir were defeated... What has happened in this time?You reunite with Dan Heng and meet a new friend: the Galaxy Ranger cowboy, Boothill. There was supposed to be an exchange of small talk here with lots of cheesy jokes and callbacks. However, as Himeko and Welt are still concerned about your well-being, this section of banter vanished into thin air. We hope for your understanding and patience in this matter.

speaker: March 7th
line: Look, they're with the General!

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: Heh, that's alright. In these times of conflict, for the sake of utmost safety, it is only right that the Alliance steps forward to mediate on behalf of the Astral Express. We must not allow you to take unnecessary risks.

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: Furthermore, despite the IPC's eagerness for success, it prioritizes "peace" above all, and The Family , trapped though it may be, professes a desire for " Harmony ." The Alliance has always won people over with reason. I firmly believe both parties can indeed put aside their differences and come to a peaceful agreement.

speaker: Himeko
line: The general possesses a deep understanding of the greater good. With the Xianzhou Alliance mediating, peace for Penacony is within reach.

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: You flatter me! But ultimately, it's been all down to the Express. Without your efforts, this Sweetdream Paradise would have been claimed by the last remnants of "Order" before there was even a shot at peace...

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: Well would you look at that. Here comes the big hero.

children.speaker: Jing Yuan
children.line: Hahaha, here's the Galactic Baseballer — the paragon of both heroism and humility!

children.speaker: Jing Yuan
children.line: Hahaha, if it isn't the Galactic Baseballer — a true hero who dares to take action!

text: Lemme guess, you were thinking about me... again?

children.speaker: Jing Yuan
children.line: Hahaha, if it isn't the Galactic Baseballer — a hero with unparalleled insight!

speaker: Welt
line: ▶ (Trailblazer), are you okay? I heard you couldn't wake up. Are you feeling unwell?

speaker: March 7th
line: ▶ Don't worry, Mr. Yang. There's nothing wrong with ( him / her ) , ( he / she ) practically burned through a lifetime's worth of jokes on the way here.

speaker: March 7th
line: What about you, Mr. Yang? I heard that even Miss Robin wasn't spared, and that guy locked you both up...

speaker: Welt
line: It's a long story... but, at least Mr. Sunday took it easy on us.

speaker: Welt
line: He used an ability called "tuning" to connect our consciousnesses with his. In other words, he imprisoned us within his consciousness.

speaker: Welt
line: Thanks to General Jing Yuan's destruction of the Harmonious Choir, we were able to escape.

speaker: March 7th
line: Ah, he used that "tuning" on us, too! Does that mean that we were almost imprisoned as well...?

speaker: Himeko
line: I can confidently say now, he was truly after a fair fight with us. Had he wanted, he could have easily taken us down... without so much as lifting a finger.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: Speaking of the Oak Family head... Where is he now?

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: It's complicated, but in a nutshell, he's now the former Oak Family head.

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: The IPC has named him the key figure in The Family's Penacony split, citing a threat to Cosmic peace. He must represent The Family and answer for the unrest caused. His trial is set to take place at Pier Point .

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: The Family quickly labeled him and the remnants of the Order as enemies, declaring the turmoil an internal rebellion. This move effectively barred the IPC from intervening in "Family affairs" on both moral and rational grounds.

speaker: Welt
line: Everyone really has their own agenda after all...

speaker: March 7th
line: Then... what's going to happen to Miss Robin? She and Sunday won't be able to deny their involvement in the Charmony Festival, they're siblings after all...

speaker: March 7th
line: Why the sigh, General?

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: I can only say that this incident is an unexpected mess for the girl. The Alliance will try to persuade The Family to consider this matter carefully during mediation.

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: It's time, everyone. The IPC's key members and I have agreed to consult one another before the upcoming negotiation. Do any of you wish to sit in?

speaker: Himeko
line: Given the general's invitation and the matter's significance to the universe, the Crew will naturally accept. However, if the IPC has any reservations...

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: Why of course you're welcome! They've mentioned that your team is a trusted ally of the IPC in Penacony, so there's no reason not to welcome you.

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: Besides, if there can be reliable observers from the Astral Express present, discussions will go more smoothly. So, what do you all think?

speaker: Himeko
line: Well then, we shall oblige.

speaker: March 7th
line: ...I'm a kind of allergic to those types of situations. I think I'll just head back to my room and start packing.

speaker: Welt
line: Not to worry. Himeko and I will take care of things.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: I'm afraid I'll also have to return to the Express first. The conductor is worried about us. It's best I go and explain the situation.

speaker: Himeko
line: ▶ Thank you. What about you, (Trailblazer)? Will you join Welt and me, or have you got other plans?

children.speaker: Jing Yuan
children.line: Haha, great.

text: I HAVE TO help March pack her suitcase...

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: What? I can pack it myself, you know...

children.speaker: Jing Yuan
children.line: Haha, if that's the case, our Galactic Baseballer can join us.

text: Dunno why, but something tells me I only have one real option here...

children.speaker: Jing Yuan
children.line: Haha, good guess!

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: ▶ Although I'm not too sure of the reason, the representatives from the IPC have insisted on (Trailblazer)'s presence — allow me to lead the way, follow me please!

text: Go to the Lobby and meet with the IPC representative

title: Step Description
content: The Express Crew finally reunite victoriously. Accompanying you are Black Swan, the Memokeeper and Jing Yuan, the Luofu General.The General and various IPC dignitaries have agreed to hold talks regarding the Charmony Festival incident — and they have invited the Express Crew to be present... You in particular, (Trailblazer). You have no reason to turn down this offer, right?

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: The negotiation will commence at the hotel lobby. Everyone, please follow me.

text: Speak with the IPC and Intelligentsia Guild representatives

speaker: Himeko
line: Mr. Aventurine and Miss Topaz are here too... And, who is that over there?

speaker: Welt
line: The Intelligentsia Guild's Dr. Ratio . This assembly is quite something.

text: (Talk to Aventurine, Dr. Ratio, or Topaz)

speaker: Aventurine
line: It's been a while, my Astral Express friends.

speaker: Aventurine
line: I would also extend my sincere thanks to you, General of the Luofu . The presence of everyone here assures that the talks will likely reach a conclusion that satisfies all sides.

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: Oh? Looks like everyone has come with expectations. Care to share?

speaker: Aventurine
line: Of course. Topaz, if you please?

speaker: Topaz
line: Sure, leave it to me.

speaker: Topaz
line: In summary, it's good news — after much deliberation from the Strategic Investment Department 's council, the absolute majority of members have agreed to the following resolutions:

speaker: Topaz
line: "In light of long-term considerations for interastral peace, and by authority of Pier Point HQ, the Strategic Investment Department — on behalf of the Interastral Peace Corporation — will permanently relinquish its claim on Penacony sovereignty, and offer unconditional support of The Family's rebuilding efforts on Penacony."

speaker: Himeko
line: Uh...

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: Heh, now that's something.

text: So, the IPC does see the big picture, huh?

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: "All in the name of peace" — that's our motto.

text: What's in it for you guys?

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: To be honest, it does nothing to benefit the IPC... but it is extremely beneficial to the long-term development of the entire universe.

text: Doesn't that mean Aventurine took a hit for nothing?

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: Haha, if that's what it takes to bring peace to the entire universe, it's a price I'll gladly pay.

speaker: Dr. Ratio
line: Has the IPC finished sharing all its thoughts? Then it's our turn.

speaker: Dr. Ratio
line: The Guild, much like the Genius Society , has taken a keen interest in the recent calamity in Penacony. Ultimately, both parties have agreed to a comprehensive collaboration, offering technical support for the reconstruction of Penacony...

speaker: Dr. Ratio
line: ...The floor is yours for the finer points, Mr. Screwllum . Enlighten us, please.

speaker: Screwllum
line: Organic life's unrelenting search to understand the realm of inner spirituality is something I both admire and envy. Inorganic life has no mechanism to evoke dreams. But when my mechanical impulses are activated, my inspiration circuits will start to operate, and I will enter a state defined as "imagination."

speaker: Screwllum
line: Every time, within the realm of imagination, there emerges a fire from the shadows. It is warm, bright. I frequently ponder, this flame might represent the essence of intelligence — a cluster of inspiration ignited by high temperatures. The future direction of the universe may well lie within it.

speaker: Screwllum
line: Alas, they are nothing but projections of my thought system to me — desired, but unattainable. But after learning of Penacony's accomplishments, I have come to realize that the flame is not beyond my grasp.

speaker: Screwllum
line: After deliberations with my partners, we have decided to defer the progress of the Simulated Universe project, and instead assist the Intelligentsia Guild as technological consultants in the research of the Dreamscape and Memory Zone, so that these assets may be better used to serve humanity.

speaker: Dr. Ratio
line: Not only that, we've also established contact with the Garden of Recollection through the IPC, and they've pledged their support for our research endeavors...

speaker: Dr. Ratio
line: I am truly happy for the Dreamchasers on Penacony — the cosmos's brightest and, let's admit, dimmer intellects are now at their service.

text: Hooray! It's a big win for everyone!

children.speaker: Welt
children.line: But... *sigh* Never mind. At the end of the day, this is a positive outcome.

text: I keep getting this feeling that this is all too good to be true...

children.speaker: Welt
children.line: Agreed. It's hard to imagine members of the Genius Society taking an interest in such mundane research...

children.speaker: Welt
children.line: *sigh* Never mind. At the end of the day, this is a positive outcome.

speaker: Himeko
line: ▶ No wonder everyone insisted that ( he / she ) be there.

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: It heartens me to learn that everyone is willing to put aside their differences for Penacony's plight. I trust that everyone will surely reach consensus in the upcoming negotiations.

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: Looks like Penacony's future is decided. I'm wondering, is there anything else the Crew is concerned about?

speaker: Himeko
line: Peace is our greatest wish — beyond that, we desire nothing else.

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: Haha, well that's good. Now that everyone's minds are at ease, I shall take my leave. You may now depart with peace of mind — the Alliance will deal with all subsequent procedures.

speaker: Himeko
line: If that's the case, it appears that we have nothing else to worry about on Penacony... Looks like it's time for us to embark on a new voyage.

speaker: Welt
line: Sounds good to me.

speaker: Himeko
line: You two head back to the Express first. I'll pick up March and deal with the check-out procedure. Oh also, Miss Black Swan, you have a matter to discuss with me, yes?

speaker: Black Swan
line: Nothing escapes your attention, Miss Navigator.

speaker: Welt
line: ▶ You've been with us this whole time, huh. In any case, (Trailblazer) and I will be waiting for you and March on the Express.

speaker: Welt
line: ▶ Let's go, (Trailblazer). Our time on Penacony... has come to a fruitful end.

title: Step Description
content: The IPC decides to develop Penacony alongside The Family, and scholars from all over the universe will assist in every way they can... It is a lively scene where all's well that ends well. With this, your journey to Penacony, the "Land of the Dreams" has come to an end.It's time to embark on a new adventure.

speaker: (Trailblazer)
line: ▶ (Penacony's journey ends here...)

speaker: (Trailblazer)
line: ▶ (I guess it was pretty fruitful.)

speaker: Topaz
line: ▶ This is all due to your heroic deeds in Penacony. Everyone's been moved by your integrity and selflessness.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Seems the dust has finally settled, no? Well done, friend.

speaker: Dr. Ratio
line: I am truly happy for the Dreamchasers on Penacony — the cosmos's brightest and, let's admit, dimmer intellects are now at their service.

text:
(Teleport toParlor Car)
(ObtainAchievementIf We Walk in the Light)

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: ▶ (Trailblazer), the navigation meeting is about to start. We're all waiting for you!

speaker: (Trailblazer)
line: ▶ (When did the Express become so lively...?)

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: Ahem... looks like everyone's present. Let the navigation meeting commence then!

speaker: Boothill
line: This a meeting to decide on our next stop? How we doin' this, by show of hands?

speaker: Black Swan
line: Hold your horses, cowboy. It's for those to decide.

children.speaker: Boothill
children.line: Hah, I'm just catching a lift. Don't sweat it!

text: Black Swan, how come you're here too?

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: Shouldn't this be expected of a Memokeeper?

text: What in tarnation are you guys doing here?

speaker: Himeko
line: Allow me to explain: Mr. Boothill and Miss Black Swan submitted a request to temporarily travel with the Express for their own personal reasons...

speaker: Himeko
line: As you all may also know, the Astral Express never declines any passenger whose heart yearns for the distant stars. Therefore, they will be traveling with us for a while, until they reach their destinations.

speaker: March 7th
line: Whoa... The Express is going to be much livelier now. But Miss Black Swan, you'd better not use your Memokeeper abilities to pull any pranks!

speaker: Black Swan
line: Understood, Miss March. I promise you, you'll never see me in your room while you're taking a break.

speaker: March 7th
line: Uhm... Don't, you're freaking me out...

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: All right. All right. Now that everyone's met everyone, we can continue our navigation meeting!

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: Firstly, Pom-Pom wishes to thank everyone. If it weren't for you all unearthing the truth about Penacony, Pom-Pom would have never known where Mikhail and the rest had gone...

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: What they had to go through was regrettable, but I reckon they all fulfilled their wishes... And it was thanks to all of you — thank you, everyone.

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: Now then, we come to the crux of this navigation meeting: We must decide on the Express' next stop! Let me introduce our current options.

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: The first choice is from Himeko: The oceanic planet of Lushaka — a planet composed entirely of water. Many aquatic races reside there. Of course, it's also the home planet of the venerable Nameless , Mikhail .

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: The second choice is the "Agate World" Melustanin , suggested by Welt. It's famed as one of the initial sites of the Stellaron Disaster and the place where "the Beauty " Idrila ascended. Today, it's celebrated as a planet of undying allure.

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: The third choice is Edo Star , a planet nestled within a vast ion storm region, currently under assault by the Antimatter Legion . However, the distress signals from there have recently ceased, prompting the IPC's wish for us to check in on the situation.

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: The last choice, courtesy of Black Swan, is the "Glass Belt" Patrevia , a massive belt of asteroids that was turned to glass by the Lord Ravager Zephyro ... These days it's apparently known to house one of the branches of the Mourning Actors troupe.

speaker: March 7th
line: Ooh... So many options. I'm seeing stars already.

speaker: Himeko
line: Next up, everyone will select the destination that they wish to visit. And then, we'll put it to a vote.

children.speaker: Himeko
children.line: Little Misha and Old Mikhail's homeland... Having been through so much in Penacony, as an aspiring Nameless, I believe a visit to his home world is a must.

children.speaker: Welt
children.line: Count me in. Still, I imagine that planet must have changed entirely after the Stellaron Disaster. I've heard that its landmasses no longer exist, and the native population has completely changed...

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: Hmm... I'm not against Miss Himeko's choice, but Edo Star sounds like it's in danger. As Nameless, should we not extend a helping hand?

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: March is right. Though the fact that the distress signals have ceased means we're probably too late... but I still think we should investigate the situation there.

children.speaker: Pom-Pom
children.line: Three votes for Lushaka, two for Edo...

children.speaker: Pom-Pom
children.line: Looks like we have a winner. Next stop: Lushaka, the ocean planet!

children.speaker: Welt
children.line: This trip to Penacony has allowed me to see another side of the Stellaron Disaster... In terms of symbolism, the state of the Dreamscape bears a striking resemblance to the Agate World. Visiting it might deepen our understanding of the Stellaron.

children.speaker: Himeko
children.line: Mm... that makes sense. If that's the case, I vote for the Agate World too.

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: Hmm... I personally think the situation on Edo Star might be more urgent. As Nameless, should we not extend a helping hand?

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: March is right. Though the fact that the distress signals have ceased means we're probably too late... but I still think we should investigate the situation there.

children.speaker: Pom-Pom
children.line: Three votes for the Agate World, two for Edo Star...

children.speaker: Pom-Pom
children.line: Looks like we have a winner. Next stop: The Agate World, Melustanin!

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: Though the fact that the distress signals have ceased means we're probably too late... but I still think we should investigate the situation there.

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: Yes, I agree! As Nameless, should we not extend a helping hand?

children.speaker: Welt
children.line: ▶ (Trailblazer) and Dan Heng make good points. I'll throw in a vote for Edo Star too.

children.speaker: Himeko
children.line: If that's the general sentiment, then we should indeed investigate. I vote for Edo Star too.

children.speaker: Pom-Pom
children.line: All votes for Edo Star...

children.speaker: Pom-Pom
children.line: Looks like we have a winner. Next stop: Edo Star!

children.speaker: Himeko
children.line: Black Swan has arranged to meet a Mourning Actor there. I've heard they're preparing a special performance... I wouldn't mind going to enjoy the show.

children.speaker: Welt
children.line: That type of performance isn't really my cup of tea, but... I'll let you all decide.

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: Hmm... I'm really interested to check out this troupe's performance, but it really sounds like the Edo Star is in a lot of trouble. As Nameless, should we not extend a helping hand?

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: March is right. Though the fact that the distress signals have ceased means we're probably too late... but I still think we should investigate the situation there.

children.speaker: Pom-Pom
children.line: Three votes for the Glass Belt, two for Edo Star...

children.speaker: Pom-Pom
children.line: Looks like we have a winner. Next stop: The Glass Belt, Patrevia!

text: I can't make up my mind...

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: If that's the case... How about we go to Edo Star first? If that planet really is in danger, then we should go help them out.

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: March is right. Though the fact that the distress signals have ceased means we're probably too late... but I still think we should investigate the situation there.

children.speaker: Welt
children.line: ▶ You and Dan Heng make good points. I'll throw in a vote for Edo Star too.

children.speaker: Himeko
children.line: If that's the general sentiment, then we should indeed investigate. I vote for Edo Star too.

children.speaker: Pom-Pom
children.line: Four votes for Edo Star, one vote abstained...

children.speaker: Pom-Pom
children.line: Looks like we have a winner. Next stop: Edo Star!

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: Then this navigation meeting is adjourned. I'll go check the warp jump coordinates. Everyone can catch up on some rest in the meantime.

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: When it's time to make the jump, Pom-Pom will make an announcement!

text: Speak with Black Swan and wait for the warp jump to begin

speaker: (Trailblazer)
line: ▶ (There's still some time before the jump... What should I do?)

speaker: Black Swan
line: ▶ (Trailblazer), how about a chat? Over here.

speaker: March 7th
line: Please let this trip be uneventful. Please let this trip be uneventful. Please let this trip be uneventful...

text: Please let this trip be uneventful...

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: What's with you and always copying the way I talk!

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: Mumbling!? I'm praying!

speaker: March 7th
line: The last couple of trailblazing expeditions have been downright terrifying... It's about time we had some fun, cozy, and cute adventures for a change!

speaker: March 7th
line: Come on, start praying with me! ! [ sic ] Please let this trip be uneventful. Please let this trip be uneventful. Please let this trip be uneventful...

speaker: Dan Heng
line: For some reason, I'm suddenly stricken by the feeling that... we haven't crossed paths in quite some time.

text: It has indeed been a while.

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: Perhaps... the joy of reuniting after a long time can also be considered just another part of the Trailblaze.

children.text: This time, you must disembark with us when we reach our destination!

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: ...I should have known better than to expect anything serious from you.

children.text: This time, you must disembark with us when we reach our destination!

speaker: Dan Heng
line: Got it.

speaker: Boothill
line: This Astral Express sure is comfy... but, I got one tiny problem with it. How come there ain't no potent drinks on this ride?

speaker: Boothill
line: I can live without malt juice, but at least stock somethin' else! Like that "White Gem," common as dirt and not too pricey.

text: No way! Our express is only rated 12+!

children.speaker: Boothill
children.line: You can't use that 12-years-of-age rule against a mighty Ranger like me!

text: Is Himeko's coffee not strong enough for you?

children.speaker: Boothill
children.line: Uh, well... That's a different kind of "strong"...

text: I'll help you ask the conductor.

children.speaker: Boothill
children.line: ▶ Thanks, ( brother / sister ) ! Any low-cost swill will do, I ain't fussy.

speaker: Boothill
line: Ha, all these years out in the wild, and now I'm bunkin' in luxury... Gotta say, it's quite the treat.

speaker: Welt
line: ▶ (Trailblazer), you're fast becoming an excellent Trailblazer. It's an honor to be able to watch you grow.

children.speaker: Welt
children.line: Don't downplay your achievements, everyone has witnessed your growth. I've known many warriors in my time, and only a few achieve the kind of growth you have. Back home, where I'm from you'd be rated at least an S-tier.

children.speaker: Welt
children.line: Yes, yes, you are. I've known many warriors in my time, and only a few achieve the kind of growth you have. Back home, where I'm from you'd be rated at least an S-tier.

speaker: Welt
line: It's not been easy for you these past few days. You've earned some downtime. I'm looking forward to seeing how you'll perform on our next journey.

speaker: Himeko
line: ▶ Come to think of it, (Trailblazer), this trip to Penacony was the first time we Trailblazed together, wasn't it?

text: I hope we can Trailblaze together again someday.

children.speaker: Himeko
children.line: Don't worry. We'll have plenty of time to spend together on the Express, so there'll definitely be more chances for adventures like this.

text: It was too dangerous. I wish you hadn't gone down.

children.speaker: Himeko
children.line: It's alright! I understand your concern, but it's okay. I'm also a capable Nameless, just like yourself.

speaker: Himeko
line: Turn in early today. You've really been pushing yourself hard recently. If you don't take this chance to recharge, it could lead to long-term problems... It seems fine when you're young, but it's a different story as you age.

speaker: Black Swan
line: ▶ Oh? You're here, (Trailblazer). Seeing your reflection among the stars in the porthole... really does seem somewhat surreal.

speaker: Black Swan
line: How about it, this journey of beautiful dreams... Was it to your liking?

text: What a rollercoaster ride! It's just... so peak... Keep it coming!

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: I can feel your obvious excitement... That means your memories will also become even more beautiful.

text: It kind of left me wanting more, you know...

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: That tinge of regret I sense... Ah, these are the kinds of lasting memories I cherish.

text: Seems like there are still lotsa loose ends, no?

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: There's a rich scent of curiosity here... Such memories can be irresistibly captivating.

text: It's nothing short of a deus ex machina !

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: Ah, such an intense emotion... Heh, makes you break out in a sweat, but you just can't get enough.

text: When the next survey comes, I'll be checking the "Too Easy" box... AGAIN.

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: Oh? Such elusive emotions... I've never encountered memories quite like this before, it's stirred my curiosity.

speaker: Black Swan
line: So... How about you hand that "small parting gift" back to me? I'm quite eager to have it back.

speaker: Black Swan
line: Mm...

text: I... I wasn't the one who broke it...

speaker: Black Swan
line: Hmm, never mind...

speaker: Black Swan
line: I just... stumbled upon a particularly fascinating spot in your memory.

speaker: Black Swan
line: ▶ Before I explain... I would like to apologize to you, (Trailblazer): This farewell gift I gave you isn't really a compass from the Memory Zone... but a merely an empty Light Cone .

speaker: Black Swan
line: Remember when we entered the hotel in the Dreamscape for the first time, and I procured a few trinkets from your companions? Their functions are similar.

speaker: Black Swan
line: This way, I can always be attuned to your location, ready to assist immediately if you encounter any threats.

speaker: Black Swan
line: But... this is not its most intrinsic function.

speaker: Black Swan
line: Light Cones are slices of light used to encapsulate solidified phenomena . This empty Light Cone is the same.

speaker: Black Swan
line: It can etch your memories in their most vivid form, and then... allow me to admire and manipulate them, turning them into unique mementos.

speaker: Black Swan
line: All the world is born from the power of mind and soul, and that power is "memory." To prevent ourselves from being forgotten by the world, we must make the world remember us... or, use our memories to recreate it.

speaker: Black Swan
line: ▶ Life, seemingly vast, offers but a scant collection of impactful memories: Some joyful, some sorrowful, some light, some heavy... But you, (Trailblazer), are different.

speaker: Black Swan
line: Memory is a reflection of the future. Within that reflection, I see your unparalleled worth. You have the power to craft memories that can captivate the world... Your memory can illuminate the universe's future path.

speaker: Black Swan
line: And that memory... will be as scintillating as the star clusters you see in this porthole.

text: Which is why you want to collect my memories?

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: Precisely. But, do you know the deeper meaning behind it?

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: How adorable. But, do you know the deeper meaning behind it?

text: Help me take a look, am I about to ascend?

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: The memories I have of you are not enough for me to predict a future that lies too far ahead.

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: But, I can tell you one thing: My favor towards you stems from a more profound reason.

speaker: Black Swan
line: The reason is simple: In this grandiose and ostentatious dream of The Family's, only you personally experienced the entire course .

speaker: Black Swan
line: Patience, my friend. I will reveal the answer to you... but that time is not now.

speaker: Black Swan
line: Turn around and take a look at your friends. Every one of them is reveling at the arrival of their next destination, all filled with hopes and expectations of their own present and future. Revealing everything at this moment would be a bit of a buzzkill, wouldn't it?

speaker: Black Swan
line: I'm looking for an opportune time, a time when you're totally at ease... Perhaps, when the night grows hazy, and you're about to drift off would be the most opportune.

speaker: Black Swan
line: How about one fine night? I will prepare the candles, aromatics, and even a cushy couch to create a cozy dream land for you. And then, I will tell you the answer in the form of a little bedtime story to lull you to sleep...

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: Ahem, hi, hello~ Attention all passengers.

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: The Express is about to make the jump — please be seated and hold on!

speaker: Black Swan
line: Heh, it looks like we're finally about to set off. There are countless gleaming memories out there waiting for us... Why don't we just leave it at that for now?

speaker: Black Swan
line: Ah, that's right. As a small token of compensation for playing that little trick on you with the empty Light Cone, I will gift you with some words — they hold great significance to me...

speaker: Black Swan
line: "Life is akin to a winding labyrinth, where memories serve as our sole companions."

speaker: Black Swan
line: You'll remember these words dearly, won't you?

text: ▶ In the year 2158 of the Amber Era , the first year of the new epoch, the universe resumed its intended trajectory. The kindling of conspiracy smoldered in Penacony, the Land of the Dreams. Failing to erupt into a blaze, it instead flickered briefly on Qlipoth 's anvil, before vanishing in the blink of an eye.

▶ The dead and those fated to die remain in their eternal slumber, while the living find solace in deep sleep. All clamored in a cacaphony of silence, and then went about their own ways. The cosmos emananted a vitality characteristic of a new era, all for the modest price of a brother and sister's mild grief.
▶ Babies are born as stars extinguish. The silver rail unfolds. The story of the Astral Express comes to a close, yet it also embarks anew.
▶ Time marches forward, heralding the arrival of a new chapter in the history of Trailblazing expeditions.

Penacony, Land of the Dreams The End Honkai: Star Rail Lead Actors (Trailblazer) Starring Dan Heng as Dan Heng ??? as March 7th Himeko as Himeko Joachim Nokianvirtanen as Welt Yang Firefly as Firefly, SAM ??? as Acheron Black Swan as Black Swan Kakavasha as Aventurine Mikhail Char Legwork as Misha, Watchmaker Gallagher as Gallagher Boothill as Boothill Sparkle as Sparkle Veritas Ratio as Dr. Ratio Robin as Robin Sunday as Sunday "Dreammaster" as Sunday's Servant Gopher Wood as "Dreammaster" Cameo Appearances Silver Wolf Sampo Topaz and Jade Argenti Jing Yuan and the Xianzhou Alliance Script Supervisor Elio In Loving Memory Razalina Tiernan Mikhail Char Legwork May This Journey Lead Us Starward

speaker: Black Swan
line: Countless shooting stars streak the sky tonight... If you can pick the right one, it will carry your wish to thousands of distant worlds.

speaker: Black Swan
line: You're feeling very relaxed now, aren't you? So then...

speaker: Black Swan
line: It's time to tell you a little bedtime story .
